justification: "Subjects' task was to indicate the tilt direction … while simultaneously rating their confidence using a continuous confidence scale. This scale ranged from 50 % to 100 % accuracy"
"The confidence ratings were originally given on a continuous scale but were rescaled to a 6-point confidence scale before analyses"
"we created RT-derived proxies for confidence … by coding the faster 25 % of RTs as RT-derived confidence of 4, the next 25 % …"
